attributes.action: KEEP THE POPPIES AT THE TOWER OF LONDON UNTIL THE NEW YEAR
attributes.additional_details:
To extend the removal date of the 888,246 poppies at the Tower Of London to the end of 2014, over the currently date of the 12th of November 2014.

This will ensure the display of remembrance is viewed over the Christmas period to maximise the impact and significance to tourists and residence alike, as well as to commemorate the end of this 100th year anniversary of the Great War.
